channel.title: Constitution 508
channel.description: hey im DemonWars, i have seen alot of peeps on 317's with hp maxed to 990, is there anyway on a 508 to change the max variable of 255 hp change to 990 (so that the return to 0 value is changed to 1000 when it hits it)
